name: loouislow
description: My personal and portfolio website built with krugurt.js MVP framework

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/* && npm run build-image && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-style && npm run build-html && npm run build-data && npm run locale && npm run service-worker && npm run app-manifest && rm -rfv ./dist/assets/css/base.css ./dist/assets/css/style_merged.css
scripts.build-style: npm run gulp sass && npm run gulp css && npm run gulp purge-css
scripts.build-scripts: npm run gulp pre-scripts && npm run gulp scripts
scripts.build-image: npm run gulp image-high-quality && npm run gulp image-low-quality && npm run gulp webp-high-quality && npm run gulp webp-low-quality

author: Loouis Low <loouis@gmail.com>
